module.sqlWrap: SELECT Top (@Top) fc.* FROM FollowedCircle fc inner join Circle c on fc.CircleId = c.CircleId WHERE (fc.PassportId=@PassportId) and c.Status=1 ORDER BY fc.IsCreator DESC, fc.FollowId DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM FollowedCircle WHERE (CircleId=@CircleId) AND (FollowId > @MaxId) ORDER BY FollowId DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM FollowedCircle WHERE (CircleId=@CircleId) AND (FollowId < @MinId) ORDER BY FollowId DESC
SELECT Count(1) FROM FollowedCircle WHERE (CircleId=@CircleId) AND (PassportId = @PassportId)
SELECT CircleId FROM FollowedCircle WHERE (CircleId IN (@CircleIds)) AND (PassportId=@PassportId)
DELETE FROM FollowedCircle WHERE CircleId=@CircleId And PassportId=@PassportId UPDATE Circle SET FollowedCount=(SELECT count(1) FROM FollowedCircle WHERE CircleId=@CircleId) WHERE CircleId=@CircleId

INSERT INTO FollowedCircle(CircleId,PassportId,IsCreator,CreatedTime) VALUES (@CircleId,@PassportId,@IsCreator,@CreatedTime) UPDATE Circle SET FollowedCount=(SELECT count(1) FROM FollowedCircle WHERE CircleId=@CircleId) WHERE CircleId=@CircleId SELECT @@IDENTITY
